com.asm.text

Class TextPointers<T extends TextPointer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<T>
          • com.asm.text.TextPointers<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.text.NoCopySpan, android.text.TextWatcher, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<T>, java.util.Collection<T>, java.util.List<T>, java.util.RandomAccess
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextSelections

    public class TextPointers<T extends TextPointer>
extends java.util.ArrayList<T>
implements android.text.TextWatcher
    This class is used when wants to mark where is 'the point' on the text.

    For example, in text "Hello world!", you inserted the pointer between w and o. If text was inserted at front of the pointer, it will be moved to back. If text inserted at the back of the pointer, nothing.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
